snippet.title: Chronescher Trailer
snippet.description:
Chronescher is a challenging turn-based puzzle game in Escher-esque spaces. Use impossible geometries, teleportation and environmental snapshots to navigate your mind and uncover your lost memories.

Get Chronescher on steam now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1911170/Chronescher/

Chronescher is developed and published by Purple Sloth studio e.G. 
Visit Purple Sloth Studios Website at https://purplesloth.studio
Follow Purple Sloth Studio on Twitter at https://twitter.com/studio_sloth
